baseRules: Navigate from the start Wikipedia page to the end page using only links within Wikipedia articles. The first player to reach the end page wins. The game requires at least 2 active players to start (observers do not count).

creator: Once all have selected / been given a link, the owner needs to continue the game.
democratic: Once all have selected / been given a link, everyone needs to agree to continue.

random: You have $countdownTime$s to choose a link once another player has chosen. If a player doesn't choose a link in time, a random link will be selected for them.
player: You have $countdownTime$s to choose a link once another player has chosen. If a player doesn't choose a link in time, the first player who chose a link will select the link for them.

enabled: Effect cards can be used to affect other players' paths. Effect cards will be available for use after link selection.

once: A player can only suffer the effects of a single effect card during each round.
unlimited: A player can suffer the effects of an effect card multiple times during each round.

free_for_all: Players have $additions_timer$s to play the cards they like, all at the same time.
round_robin: Each player has $additions_timer$s to play the cards they like, then the next player does the same (in a random order).

bomb: Bomb üí£ cards make random links inaccessible for other players. Each player starts with $additions_bomb$ bomb cards.
swap: Swap üîÑ cards allow players to exchange their current link with another player. Each player starts with $additions_swap$ swap cards.
return: Return ‚Ü©Ô∏è cards force players to go back to their previous link. Each player starts with $additions_return$ return cards.
creatorGive: The room owner can manually give effect cards to players during the game.
obtainWithExposure: Players receive random effect cards after being affected by $additions_obtainWithExposure$ other players' cards.
obtainWithTimer: Players receive random effect cards after missing $additions_obtainWithTimer$ link selections.
multiplePerRound: Players can use multiple effect cards in a single round.
